name: ip-num
description: A TypeScript library for working with IPv4, IPv6 and ASN numbers. It provides representations of these internet protocol numbers with the ability to perform various IP related operations like parsing, validating etc. on them

scripts.ipnum-build: npm run clean && npm run compile && cp package.json README.md ./dist/src && cd ./dist/src && webpack --config ../../webpack.config.js
scripts.ipnum-releasecommit: git add . && git commit -m 'updating documentation in preparation for release'
scripts.ipnum-release: npm run ipnum-gendoc && npm run ipnum-build && npm run ipnum-releasecommit && npm run ipnum-publish

author: Dadepo Aderemi
